channel.title: Server
channel.description: To make an hamachi server all you need to do is open a hamachi network the go to source>client.java and search for server and change the ip to the hamachi ip? this is only? and should you do this in client files too?

item.title: Server
item.dc:creator: @JavaLearner JavaLearner
item.description:
@JavaLearner wrote:

The IP MUST be changed in the client, not the source.

search client.java OR Config.java (if you have that in your CLIENT folder)
